gate.termraider.bank

Class TfIdfTermbank

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer
      • gate.creole.AbstractResource
        • gate.creole.AbstractLanguageResource
          • gate.termraider.bank.AbstractBank
            • gate.termraider.bank.AbstractTermbank
              • gate.termraider.bank.TfIdfTermbank
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.gui.ActionsPublisher, gate.LanguageResource, gate.Resource, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.util.NameBearer, Serializable

    @CreoleResource(name="TfIdfTermbank",
                icon="termbank-lr.png",
                comment="TermRaider Termbank derived from vectors in document features",
                helpURL="http://gate.ac.uk/userguide/sec:creole:termraider:tfidf")
public class TfIdfTermbank
extends AbstractTermbank
implements gate.gui.ActionsPublisher
